channel.title: Server Attack Animations are different then Clients?
channel.description: So apparently, the reason behind most of slayer monster's attack animations that are screwed is because its not the same as the clients? How would I fix this? [img]http://imageshack.us/m/813/8426/anim.png[/img]

item.title: Server Attack Animations are different then Clients?
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Spencer4678:

Thank you very much, I’ve noticed your signature but do you or anyone happen to know the file in a PI base that I need to edit to fix it?

I think the animations for npcs are client sided. Not sure though.
Could be in your Entity or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Attack Animations are different then Clients?

item.title: Server Attack Animations are different then Clients?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

http://uppit.com/fx8h4teebpig/NPC_Details.txt

Has the stand emote of the NPC’s, also, the attack block and die emote is the stand emote +1

Example: Stand is 2012, Block is 2013.

Read full topic
